template.name: Fake_o

query.formula: simulate[<=TAU; 10]{humanFatigue[currH-1], humanPositionX[currH-1], humanPositionY[currH-1], amy.idle or amy.p_1, amy.busy or amy.p_2, amy.sit or amy.p_3, amy.run or amy.p_4, amy.in_waiting_room, amy.from_office, amy.ort, fake_o.next }
query.comment: amy_bis.F, amy_bis.lambda, amy_bis.mi, internalRobX, internalRobY, amy_bis.idle or amy_bis.p_1 or amy_bis.p_2 or amy_bis.c1 or amy_bis.c2, amy_bis.busy or amy_bis.p_3 or amy_bis.p_4 or amy_bis.c3, robPositionX, robPositionY, rob.idle, rob.starting or rob.moving or rob.turning or rob.stopping or rob.c_1 or rob.c_2 or rob.c_3 or rob.c_4,

query.formula: simulate[<=TAU]{humanFatigue[currH-1]*10, humanPositionX[currH-1]/100, humanPositionY[currH-1]/100, served[0], served[1], dX/100, dY/100, currH, robPositionX/100, robPositionY/100, fail, scs }
